titles.title: A bill for the relief of Jose Buendia Balderas, Alicia Aranda De Buendia, and Ana Laura Beundia Aranda.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11512)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
9/12/2007--Introduced.
Provides for the relief of Jose Buendia Balderas, Alicia Aranda De Buendia, and Ana Laura Beundia Aranda.
